sentences.sContent: The region was extremely beautiful. Nonetheless Gerard could not imagine spending the rest of his life there.
sentences.sCn: 那个地区非常漂亮，然而杰拉德却无法想象自己要在那里度过余生。

sentences.sContent: The paintings are complex, but have plenty of appeal nonetheless.
sentences.sCn: 这些画复杂难懂，不过还是不乏吸引力。

trans.tranCn: 尽管如此， 依然， 然而
trans.tranOther: in spite of the fact that has just been mentioned
